We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012. Mike Pence has been publicly pondering whether to run for the governor's office or for president for several months. The saga of the "American Idol" phenomenon, from its origins in the 2001 hit British series "Pop Idol" right up to Simon Cowell 's departure, is the focus of Richard Rushfield's breezy, gossipy American Idol: The Untold Story. Currently an entertainment columnist for the website the Daily Beast and a Vanity Fair contributing editor, Simon Cowell Rushfield blogged about "American Idol" for three years for the Los Angeles Times and clearly knows his subject well.
